title: Ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Run and chat with large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Use local LLMs in Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models. Plug local LLMs into LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Run any model locally with a polished interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Integrate local LLMs into JVM applications.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama models running locally.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama. Use local LLMs in RAG and question-answering pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app for private RAG with Ollama. Chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models running on your own hardware.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, CodeLlama, etc.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot to query Ollama models privately. Supports threads, code blocks, and streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama REST API. Async client with serde models.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama. GenServer-based client with streaming support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with support for streaming, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run private LLM assistance inside your vault using Ollama.
